name: "Plastic Soul" by Richard F. Yates (Holy Fool)
description: [Crayon on notebook page with digital embellishments and color.] I was looking at the auras of some toys at my granddaughter's house a few days ago, and I spotted a strange action-figure with a bizarre, plastic soul. (For copyright reasons, I did not draw the PHYSICAL features of the action-figure, just the "spirit form." It wasn't pretty... ---Richard F. Yates (Holy Fool)
